languages.text: {n}Всего на миг во взглядах двойников возникает страх — но Кибелла успевает заметить его. Прищурившись, она шепчет:{/n} "Значит, все было ложью? Вы смущали мой разум отравленными словами..."
{n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."
languages.original_text: {n}Всего на миг во взглядах двойников возникает страх — но Кибелла успевает заметить его. Прищурившись, она шепчет:{/n} "Значит, все было ложью? Вы смущали мой разум отравленными словами..."

traits.locale_text: "These words sound of heresy, and yet... What do I know? A shadow who had never seen beyond her ship before beholding the universe in all its horror? Perhaps the weavers glimpsed no more than a fraction of the true understanding of death. Our dogma may have been..." {n}Conviction returns to her voice.{/n} "...incomplete. But I can complete it. For I am Kibellah, Second Weaver of the Bloodspun Web, and much is within my ability."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

traits.locale_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

languages.text: {n}El miedo brilla en sus ojos por un mero instante... pero a Kibellah no se le escapa. Entrecierra los ojos y susurra:{/n} «Entonces, ¿era todo mentira? Habéis entumecido mi mente con palabras envenenadas...».
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}El miedo brilla en sus ojos por un mero instante... pero a Kibellah no se le escapa. Entrecierra los ojos y susurra:{/n} «Entonces, ¿era todo mentira? Habéis entumecido mi mente con palabras envenenadas...».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: {n}一瞬、彼女たちの目に恐怖がよぎったが、キベラはそれでも気づいた。彼女は目を細め、ささやく、{/n}「では、すべて嘘なのだな？お前は毒の言葉で我の心を曇らせた…」
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}一瞬、彼女たちの目に恐怖がよぎったが、キベラはそれでも気づいた。彼女は目を細め、ささやく、{/n}「では、すべて嘘なのだな？お前は毒の言葉で我の心を曇らせた…」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: {n}恐惧在两个冒牌货的目光中一闪而过，但绮贝菈却注意到了这一点。她眯起眼睛，低语道。{/n}“也就是说，这一切都是谎言？你们恶毒的话语蒙蔽了我的头脑……”
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}恐惧在两个冒牌货的目光中一闪而过，但绮贝菈却注意到了这一点。她眯起眼睛，低语道。{/n}“也就是说，这一切都是谎言？你们恶毒的话语蒙蔽了我的头脑……”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: {n}Nur für den Hauch eines Augenblicks flackert Angst in ihren Augen auf ... aber Kibellah bemerkt es dennoch. Sie runzelt die Stirn und flüstert: {/n} "Dann war alles eine Lüge? Ihr habt meinen Verstand mit vergifteten Worten vernebelt ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Nur für den Hauch eines Augenblicks flackert Angst in ihren Augen auf ... aber Kibellah bemerkt es dennoch. Sie runzelt die Stirn und flüstert: {/n} "Dann war alles eine Lüge? Ihr habt meinen Verstand mit vergifteten Worten vernebelt ..."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: {n}La peur qui transparaît dans leur regard se dissipe aussitôt, mais pas avant que Kibellah l'ait remarquée. Elle étrécit les yeux et murmure :{/n} « Alors, ce n'était qu'un tissu de mensonges ? Vous m'avez embrouillé l'esprit avec vos propos empoisonnés... »
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."

traits.locale_text: {n}La peur qui transparaît dans leur regard se dissipe aussitôt, mais pas avant que Kibellah l'ait remarquée. Elle étrécit les yeux et murmure :{/n} « Alors, ce n'était qu'un tissu de mensonges ? Vous m'avez embrouillé l'esprit avec vos propos empoisonnés... »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion_Ch03_NPC_Despair

languages.text: {n}İki kopyanın gözünde çok kısa bir anlığına korku beliriyor. Kibellah bunu fark ediyor. Gözlerini kısarak fısıldıyor.{/n} "Öyleyse hepsi bir yalan mıydı? Zehirli sözlerle zihnimi bulandırdınız..."
languages.original_text: {n}Fear flickers in their eyes for but a moment — but Kibellah still notices. She narrows her eyes and whispers,{/n} "Then it was all a lie? You clouded my mind with poisoned words..."
